definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: arid steppe W. of Dead Sea (in S. Judah) 1Sa 23:24, also Ez Eze 47:8, Is 51:3, whence name ´[[יׇם הָע]] Jos 3:16 (JE) ‖[[יׇם הַמֶּלַח]]), also 2Ki 14:25, De 4:49, and (‖ id.) De 3:17, Jos 12:3 (D); [[נַחַל הָעֲרָבָה]] Am 6:14 must be E. of Dead Sea, si vera l., but rd. prob. [[מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[נ]] v. [[נַחַל]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Jordan-valley W. of river + adjacent plain; near ford (opp. Jericho) 2Sa 2:29, cf. Jos 8:14 (JE); also De 11:30, 2Ki 25:4 = Je 39:4 = Je 52:7; —2Sa 15:28, 2Sa 17:16 v. [[עֲבָרָה]]

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: esp. of E. Jordan plain De 1:1 (prob.) Jos 12:1, Jos 12:3, E. half of Jordan-valley De 3:17, De 4:49; of entire Jordan-valley (between [[כִּנֶּרֶת]] and Dead Sea, mod. El-Ghôr, the Depression) De 1:7, Jos 11:2, Jos 11:16; W. Jordan plain only Jos 12:8; depression S. of Dead Sea (mod. Wady el-‘Arabah) De 2:8.
in P always pl. cstr. [[עַרְבוֹת מוֹאָב]] (E. Jordan) Nu 22:1 + 11 t. (v. [[מוֹאָב]]); [[עְרֵחוֹ]] ´[[ע]] (W. Jordan) Jos 4:13, Jos 5:10, also 2Ki 25:5 = Je 39:5 = Je 52:8.
appar. N. Arabian desert Is 40:3, Is 41:19.

in gen. the steppe (oft. ‖[[מִדְבָּר]]), Je 17:6, Je 50:12, Is 33:9, Is 35:1, Is 35:6, Job 24:5, Job 39:6, Ps 68:5; [[זְאֵב עֲרָבוֹת]] Je 5:6 (fig. of invader); cf. description of Exodus [[אֶרֶץ עֲרָבָה]] [[וְשׁוּחָה]] Je 2:6; in sim., of a plain, of future land of Judah Zec 14:10.—Vid. Dr:De 1, 1 and reff. Buhl:Geogr. 111.
